tasks.label: Start Backend Server
tasks.command: & .\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1; $env:GEMINI_API_KEY=(Get-Content .env | Select-String 'GEMINI_API_KEY' | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace 'GEMINI_API_KEY=', '' }); if (-not $env:GEMINI_API_KEY) { Write-Host 'WARNING: GEMINI_API_KEY not found in .env file' -ForegroundColor Yellow }; uvicorn agent.api:app --reload --port 8000 --host 0.0.0.0
